original_text: John baptized people. Did God give him authority to do this? Or did men tell him to do it? Now, tell me your answer.’
korean_text: 요한의 세례가 하늘로부터냐 사람으로부터냐 내게 대답하라

sentences.original_text: Did God give him authority to do this?
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그에게 이 일을 할 권위를 주셨는가?

sentences.original_text: Or did men tell him to do it?
sentences.korean_translation: 아니면 사람들이 그에게 그렇게 하라고 했는가?
